titles.title: Gas Price Relief for Schools Act of 2008
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a school bus emergency fuel grant program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 7/24/2008--Introduced. Gas Price Relief for Schools Act of 2008 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to a state or local government unit responsible for providing school bus transportation to a public school system to assist it in offsetting increases in school bus transportation operating costs due to higher fuel prices.
